meanings.definition: Relating to the act of killing infants.
meanings.sent1: The infanticidal act shocked the entire community.
meanings.sent2: The infanticidal crime was a tragic event.
meanings.sent3: The infanticidal plot in the movie was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her infanticidal thoughts were like a dark cloud over her mind.
meanings.sent5: The infanticidal nature of the character made the story haunting.

meanings.sent1: The infanticidal intentions of the villain were revealed in the final scene.
meanings.sent2: The infanticidal nature of the crime scene left everyone in disbelief.
meanings.sent3: The infanticidal twist in the story kept the audience on edge.
meanings.sent4: The infanticidal act was a stain on the history of the town.
meanings.sent5: The infanticidal deed haunted the protagonist throughout the novel.
